title: HURR DURR VLAD DOES NO DMG
body:

Yeah maybe if you built him like a bruiser with your cancer shit items like {{item:3065}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3158}} instead of full AP like the fucking MAGE he was intended to be. Pls help save my DFG vlad.
